content: The Lakers and Knicks are head-and-head for the title of the most pathetic franchise of the NBA. There should be a chart listing the worst moments from each one, updating every 2 days. This has to end with the Lakers losing their draft picks, right? The dream scenario is the Lakers signing Derrick Rose, trading for Cousins, firing Walton after 5 games next year (record 2–3, Sacramento style), and hiring Scott Skiles. I love basketball!!!!
